name: places/ChIJOcDY3Z1YwokRLnV9BD5tb4E
formattedAddress: 275 Central Park W # 1A, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 275 Central Park W # 1A, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
ORIGINAL REVIEW: JANUARY OF 2022:

I went to doctor Simeon for an assessment and diagnosis of a dissociative disorder.

I paid $650 for the appointment and gave her plenty of data to work with.

Once we closed the 1.5 hour session, she insisted she needed another appointment to give a diagnosis.

Since then it's been 5 months of no contact.

I asked for a follow up and an answer to a simple question, and she told me that she is ceasing communication and "do not contact me again".

I asked for my medical chart and mentioned a lawyer for being terminated for no reason, and then she suddenly became nice.

I will not be returning.

UPDATE: OCTOBER 2022:

I reached out to Dr Simeon, possibly considering the idea that I had misjudged her and misunderstood. She again told me never to contact her again. When I asked why, she refused to answer.

I just want to know what I've done wrong.
